title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. G, pt. 66 - Immunizations and Communicable Diseases
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. G, pt. 66 - Immunizations and Communicable Diseases

State Regulations

Subpart 66-1 - School Immunization Requirements (§ 66-1.1 to 66-1.10)

Subpart 66-2 - Immunization Against Measles, Mumps And Rubella For Post Secondary Students (§ 66-2.1 to 66-2.9)

Subpart 66-3 - [Repealed] (§ 66-3.1 to 66-3.5)

Subpart 66-4 - COVID-19 Nursing Home and Adult Care Facility Vaccination Program (§ 66-4.1 to 66-4.3)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. G, pt. 66

Statutory authority: Public Health Law, §§ 576, 2164, 2165[11], 2168, 2500-a, 2522[6], 2528, 2803, 2904, 2904-b, 3612 [6], 4010, 4175; Social Services Law, §§ 364[2], 365-a

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
